name: Display Categories Tree
author: Abderrahmane Oulmderat

sections.description:
If you need to add more css and customization options to the Default WordPress Category Widget this plugin is for you.
Using this plugin you can display your sidebar categories in a tree-view in just one click.

Features

  • The selection state is preserved (the parent category remain open)
  • Fully customized and easy to use
  • Display as dropdown or tree-view
  • Dynamically create your website tree for all posts & categories
  • Ability to hide/show count
  • Ability to hide/show child
  • When a child is selected The parent category is also selected
sections.installation:
Using The WordPress Dashboard

  1. Navigate to the ‘Add New’ Plugin Dashboard
  2. Select ‘art-post-categories-tree.zip’ from your computer
  3. Install
  4. Activate the plugin on the WordPress Plugin Dashboard
  5. Place the ‘Display Categories Tree’ into a Widget area through the ‘Appearance -> Widgets’ menu in WordPress.

Using FTP

  1. Extract ‘art-post-categories-tree.zip’ to your computer
  2. Upload the ‘art-post-categories-tree’ directory to your ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory
  3. Activate the plugin on the WordPress Plugins dashboard
  4. Place the ‘Display Categories Tree’ into a Widget area through the ‘Appearance -> Widgets’ menu in WordPress.
